title: Help I'm Not Supposed To Be Here: Overcoming rejection and abandonment
features: Are you dealing with insecurity? Abandonment? Rejection? Were you physically or sexually abused as a child? Were you abused in any way as an adult? Did your mom or dad walk out of your life? Then this book is for you. As you dive into this book, Healing will flow through it's pages. This is true story of a man who battled through fatherlessness, sexual abuse, poverty, insecurity, abandonment, and many other issues. If the author can overcome and heal, you can too. His story will encourage and inspire you to keep going down the road of healing while on life's journey.
description: Through obscurity, abandonment, and rejection.... a Man of God was birthed. Pastor Brian Gallardo grew up in a home without his father, he found out later in life his father committed suicide. He grew up around addiction and poverty which oppressed his family. Pastor Brian Gallardo beat the odds and is a perfect testimony that God can take a mess and turn it into a miracle. Pastors Brian and Jillian Gallardo are the lead pastors and founders of Lifegate Church, located in Independence, Missouri Pastor Gallardo graduated from Valor Christian College before moving to Omaha, Nebraska in 1999. There, he served as a pastoral assistant under Pastor James K. Hart at Eagles Nest Worship Center for ten years. With their pastor's blessing, Pastors Brian and Jillian Gallardo moved to Missouri and started Lifegate Church. Their life was enriched when their daughter, Olivia, was born in 2009. Pastor Gallardo has been a guest on Praise The Lord with Pastor Rod Parsley and can be seen currently on his weekly show INVASIONtv which airs on TBN Salsa. Pastor also frequently hosts Praise on TBN salsa. Through this ministry, Pastors Brian and Jillian Gallardo are passionate about JESUS and reaching the world for the Glory of God!
store: Brian Gallardo (Author),  Dr. Rod Parsley (Foreword),  Rev. James Hart (Foreword)
